job_tasks.phrase: Bouwen, implementeren en verbeteren van AI standaard oplossingen ML/Deep learning/LLM/RAG oplossingen in nieuwe en bestaande applicaties
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly mentions building, implementing, and improving AI solutions including ML, Deep Learning, LLM, and RAG, which are core modeling activities.
This phrase explicitly refers to building scripts for model training, a fundamental aspect of the modeling task.
This phrase directly mentions the construction of data pipelines, which falls under data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Verzamelen, opschonen en evalueren van data en verbindingen maken met data bronnen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the process of data collection, cleaning, evaluation, and connecting to data sources, all key components of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Het kunnen toepassen van verschillende vormen van Machine Learning in de contexten van beeldherkenning, Natural Language Processing, Spraakherkenning, Spraakgeneratie en Recommending Systems
job_tasks.justification: This phrase details the application of various ML techniques (image recognition, NLP, speech, recommendation systems), which are all aspects of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: in nieuwe en bestaande applicaties (app, webservices, etc.)
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the integration of AI solutions into applications and web services, a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: en het inbouwen hiervan in bestaande applicaties
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions incorporating AI models into existing applications, which is a software development activity.

soft_skills.phrase: Het kunnen toepassen van verschillende vormen van Machine Learning

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and improving AI solutions, specifically mentioning LLMs and RAG, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. It also highlights the application of various ML techniques and integration into applications, further supporting this classification.
